Text (FINAL): The Wellings and the Thing That Took Its Time
The Wellings were waiting for something.
They were not sure what it would be.
Arthur checked on it every day.
Eleanor said it would be ready when it was ready.
Oliver asked how long that would take.
Oliver thought it might never change.
Arthur wondered if something was wrong.
No one had seen it happen.
Some things take the time they need.
Not everything arrives quickly. Some things arrive right.
